name: Leave Me Alone (itch) (nicorm, EnzoVC, Rojoin, MystikArt, Canine Lotus)
name_original: Leave Me Alone (itch) (nicorm, EnzoVC, Rojoin, MystikArt, Canine Lotus)
description:
CONCEPT GAME: This is a build in progress of what the game will have in the future, it is NOT COMPLETED.

We are a group of students who decided to participate in this jam while we were in the middle of the semester(It contains lots of bugs so please share them with us!). We got a big scope which will be completed in the future. The main game will have at least three levels with different puzzles and mechanics, but it will be finished in the future!

Submerge yourself into the story of the young 8 year old Rob Petterson, who is suffering a severe depression due to the loss of his older borther Johnny Petterson on the earthquake of October 1990. You will navigate through his dream and fight his sadness in order to get him to be happy  and with his friends once again.

In this game you will play as Rob in one of his awful nightmares where he has to sruvive to reach the end. Will you survive? Will he survive? You have to get the keys and open the final door to escape this nightmare, and you will get to live for another day.  With his imagination he will have to surpass lots of traps and parkour in order to access the next zones, but he has to be sneaky and be careful of the scary monsters that surround him, he may or may not be friendly at all...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W A S D - Move

SPACE - Jump / Grab  the vine / Release the vine

C - Crouch

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
